text: The 1995–96 Dallas Stars season was the third National Hockey League season in Dallas, Texas (and 29th as a franchise), which would start off badly and finish badly, with a division worst 26-42-14. ==Offseason== ==Regular season== On March 11, 1996, the Stars played in the final game at the Montreal Forum. ===Final standings=== ==Schedule and results== {| class="wikitable collapsible
